ygData.subject: Re: Rune Sword
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, at low levels your starting stuff always comes back - even if you destroyed it before you died.  Easy way to get free food when starting a new char - die
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, at low levels your starting stuff always comes back - even if you
destroyed it before you died.� Easy way to get free food when starting a new
char - die the run out and loot your corpse if you had any stuff.� So maybe
there is some kind of bug with summoned items and very low levels.� I know i
have died with a dimensional pocket and logged off.� When I came back the
next day and looted my corpse - I still had my dimensional pocket and the
stuff that was in it.� So, its not really logging off but camping that
clears summoned items.
�
Snyak.

-----Original Message-----
From: Elena Glenn [mailto:braveheart@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 10:53 AM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Rune Sword


I did not log out with it though, I was killed, and upon resurrection it was
gone.� My starting sword that I had destroyed was back in my inventory.�
Does this sound right to you?� Thanks
�
Leri

-----Original Message-----
From: James Wofford < James.Wofford@... <mailto:James.Wofford@...>
>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <mailto:warriors_eq@onelist.com> <
warriors_eq@onelist.com <mailto:warriors_eq@onelist.com> >
Date: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 8:27 AM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Rune Sword


The rune sword is actually a very good one handed slashing weapon.� To bad
its also a summoned item.� Most high level magicians can create them.�
Damage 7 delay 26 i believe.��I have been able to keep one in the bank for
quit some time.� As soon as you log out with it in your inventory tho, it is
gone forever.� At least until you get a mage to make you another one.�
Anyway, the morale of the story great weapon, but summoned, so find yourself
a mage to adventure with.� This weapon and a barbed leather whip with cause
some very good damage together.
�
~Dyvim Kincaid
Stormriders of Cazic Thule

-----Original Message-----
From: Elena Glenn < braveheart@... <mailto:braveheart@...>
>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <mailto:warriors_eq@onelist.com> <
warriors_eq@onelist.com <mailto:warriors_eq@onelist.com> >
Date: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 11:07 AM
Subject: [warriors_eq] Rune Sword


Tom, I am ashamed to say that the sword was a gift from a dear friend, and I
just equipped it and walked out to battle when I was killed.� I was in such
a state of shock to find it gone, that I forgot the stats and went a little
"nuts".� I will find out for you, and get back on this.� But I still want to
know, "WHAT HAPPENED TO MY SWORD"?� LOL
�
Leri
